over 16.title: read_info
over 16.content: I confirm that I have read and understood the Information Leaflet for the above study. The information has been fully explained to me and I have been able to ask questions, all of which have been answered to my satisfaction

over 16.title: voluntary
over 16.content: I understand that taking part in this study is entirely voluntary. I understand that not taking part will have no negative impact on me.

over 16.title: leave
over 16.content: I understand that I can leave this study at any time without giving a reason. I understand that leaving this study will not affect my (insert detail as applicable - e.g. education, employment), now or in the future.

over 16.title: contact
over 16.content: I know how to contact the research team if I need to.

over 16.title: agree
over 16.content: I agree to take part in this research study, having been fully informed of the risks and benefits in the participant information leaflet provided to me.

over 16.title: data
over 16.content: I agree to the use of information about me (personal data) including (insert detail as applicable - e.g. information taken from my personnel file and records and/or information from focus group meetings etc.) being used by the research team for this research study as described in the participant information leaflet.
